body_html:
You'll need to run configure first before building TF desktop binaries.

@andrewharp I know I can build it on linux. I have vmware with ubuntu where I also have built .pb files, but can I do it in Windows? I found https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r0.12/tensorflow/contrib/cmake
but will cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release be equal to ./configure?
